name: Horrorball
description:
Get Horrorball, and bounce non-stop through a horrific world of fun!

You are a round, pixelated skull, who endlessly jumps and pounces upon diamonds and monsters across toxic, lava-filled landscapes.

While dodging deadly obstacles, you must travel to the end of each level, where, as Super Horrorball, you will treat evil bosses to their ultimate demise.

Horrorball presents you with colorful, non-stop action that will bound to horrify and entertain for hours on end!
